### Read merged data target

```{r dataAll}

all <- tar_read(cdWB_all) %>%
  select(tag, detectionDate, river, section, observedLength)

str(all)

#ojs_define(allOJS = all)
```

```{r}
tags <- all %>%
  group_by(tag) %>%
  summarize(n = n()) %>%
  arrange(desc(n)) %>%
  filter(!is.na(tag))

ojs_define(tagsOJS = tags)
```

```{ojs}
//| panel: input

viewof selectTag = Inputs.select(
  tagsOJS.map((d) => d.tag),
  {
    value: "1bf20ebcae",
    label: "Tags:",
    multiple: true
  }
)
```
